name: Moto Roller
description: Moto Roller is an arcade motorcycle racing game. You ride a fast motorcycle through a city filled with cars or along a narrow highway. Your task is to drive as far as possible, dodging oncoming cars and accelerate with the help of nitro. Along the way, collecting coins to unlock the rest of the bikes. The further you go, the more often you will encounter interference. In the event of an accident, you will start all over again. Good luck on the road.
